title: Collaborative Culture Building Project for Academic Achievement of Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and team project experience
context.additional_context: Establishing a Collaborative System to Improve Academic Achievement for Students with Disabilities in Corporate Settings, Featuring Team-Based Problem-Solving in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Tech Environments

learning_goals: Designing PBL activities that reflect the language learning needs of students with disabilities by over 80% through collaborative instructional design
Developing three or more learner-customized assessment tools in collaboration with peer teachers and experts
Acquiring the ability to operate real-time feedback systems using smartphone-based collaboration tools (e.g., KakaoTalk)
Conducting five or more knowledge-sharing sessions among teachers to improve academic achievement for students with disabilities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
